dashboard.label: Sleep Clone
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_chart_1":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Hours Slept","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent","xAxisTitleText":"Night","yAxisTitleText":"Hours"}},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"splunk.bar","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Last Night: Hours in Sleep Stages","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"dataValuesDisplay":"all","stackMode":"auto","showSplitSeries":0,"backgroundColor":"transparent"}},"viz_Axgy1AcS":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://635396c7b8fc5709375ce2d1"}},"viz_ACHqBHvK":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://635396feb8fc5709375ce2d3"}},"viz_m5r2cyWP":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"numberPrecision":1,"majorColor":"> majorValue | rangeValue(majorColorEditorConfig)","backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_Y9EumaEf"},"context":{"majorColorEditorConfig":[{"value":"#FE3A3A","to":30},{"value":"#FFD442","from":30,"to":75},{"value":"#088F44","from":75}]}},"viz_DEuIPJsp":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"**Sleep** **Score**"}},"viz_e8FCfIHP":{"type":"splunk.rectangle"},"viz_LxtMtFzR":{"type":"splunk.column","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","yAxisTitleText":"Asleep","xAxisTitleText":"Time"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_rZ8oQKG4"}},"viz_ktBOgo0H":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"**Predicted Time Asleep Next Five Days**"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="fitbit" source=fitbit:minutesleep date != date
| eventstats sum(value) as asleep by date
| eval asleep=round(asleep/60,2)
| stats values(asleep) as Asleep by date","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}},"name":"hours slept"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:minuteStagesSleep earliest= -1d
| eval stage=case(Stage=="deep", round(stages/60,2), Stage=="light",round(stages/60,2), Stage=="wake", round(stages/60,2), Stage=="rem", round(stages/60,2))
| stats values(stage) AS "Hours in Stage" by Stage","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}},"name":"sleepstage"},"ds_Y9EumaEf":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index="fitbit" source=fitbit:minutesleep
| eventstats sum(value) as asleep by date
| eval asleep=round(asleep/60,2)
| eval asleep = if((asleep > 10), asleep*7, asleep*10)
| chart max(asleep)"},"name":"Search_1"},"ds_rZ8oQKG4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index="fitbit" source=fitbit:minutesleep | eventstats sum(value) as asleep by date | eval asleep=round(asleep/60,2) | stats values(asleep) as Asleep by date
| fit StateSpaceForecast "Asleep" output_metadata=true forecast_k=5 holdback=2 into "_exp_draft_8a92dcb56dbf471e87b247a1426dda3f"
| `smartforecastviz("Asleep")`"},"name":"Search_2"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"","options":{"token":"field1","defaultValue":"@w0,now"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":1200,"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"cover","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://635396e6b8fc5709375ce2d2"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_e8FCfIHP","type":"block","position":{"x":120,"y":80,"w":160,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":150,"y":430,"w":670,"h":290}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":450,"y":40,"w":670,"h":340}},{"item":"viz_Axgy1AcS","type":"block","position":{"x":190,"y":340,"w":210,"h":133}},{"item":"viz_ACHqBHvK","type":"block","position":{"x":1120,"y":1130,"w":60,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_m5r2cyWP","type":"block","position":{"x":130,"y":110,"w":130,"h":120}},{"item":"viz_DEuIPJsp","type":"block","position":{"x":140,"y":90,"w":110,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_LxtMtFzR","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":790,"w":1000,"h":320}},{"item":"viz_ktBOgo0H","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":750,"w":310,"h":40}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"description":"","title":"Sleep Clone"}
